channel.title: How do i change eating speed
channel.description:
hello i am running stabbingscape the real source and i coded it and edited it with i weed i and we made it edgepk but i cannont figure out for my life how to change the eating speed when u eat food like... u will eat 20 foods in like 2 seconds i wanna change that
can anyone helpp!?!?! :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: How do i change eating speed
item.dc:creator: @Jake440 Jake440
item.description:
@Jake440 wrote:

[quote=“swich9999999, post:2, topic:366436”]ok here is a code for anti poison pot [code] case 179:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);

			c.sM("You drink some of the antipoison potion.");
			c.sM("You have finished your potion.");[/code]

where it says “potionDelay < 2000” just change the 2000 to a # that fits (im not sure how many sec is 2000 but you can experement)
its in potions.java in ur source[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change eating speed

item.title: How do i change eating speed
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

Davidi2:

I like to take the time to chew each mouthful at least 20 times before I swallow.

Yes indeed and time is normally registered in MS i believe so that would be 2 seconds

item.title: How do i change eating speed

item.description:
@swich9999999 wrote:

ok here is a code for anti poison pot [code] case 179:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);

			c.sM("You drink some of the antipoison potion.");
			c.sM("You have finished your potion.");[/code]

where it says “potionDelay < 2000” just change the 2000 to a # that fits (im not sure how many sec is 2000 but you can experement)
its in potions.java in ur source
